survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Grocery Shopping Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and experience with contactless grocery shopping services, including ease of use, technology reliability, and overall service quality.

questions.question_text: How often do you use contactless grocery shopping services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to gauge usage frequency. Ensure mobile-friendly formatting.

script.question_text: How often do you use contactless grocery shopping services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following contactless grocery shopping features have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice question to identify popular features. Ensure options are clear and distinct.

script.question_text: Which of the following contactless grocery shopping features have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the ease of use of contactless grocery shopping services?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who have used contactless grocery shopping services (Q1 not equal to 'This is my first time').
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents who have used contactless grocery shopping services (Q1 not equal to 'This is my first time').
